original_title: Beats of the Heart: Sukiyaki and Chips: The Japanese Sounds of Music
overview: Music/Musical - This video travelogue showcases of the music of Japan which blends western styles like jazz, rock and blues. From the goofy, high-stakes world of teen pop, to a look at a master shakuhachi (traditional flute) player, to old-line music hall shows, SUKIYAKI AND CHIPS demonstrates the dizzying spectrum of Japanese music.
title: Beats of the Heart: Sukiyaki and Chips: The Japanese Sounds of Music
